Description: System error detected: Memory cardParameter _SigLatched Bit 20
Cause: The last saving procedure may nothave been successful; the memorycard may be inoperative.
Correctives: Retry saving the data.Replace the memory card.

Description: System error detected: No memorycard availableParameter _WarnLatched Bit 20
System error detected: Data onmemory card and device do notmatchParameter _SigLatched Bit 20
Cause: Different type of device.Different type of power stage.Data on memory card does notmatch firmware version of device.

Description: System error detected: Incompatibledata on the memory cardParameter _SigLatched Bit 20
System error detected: Capacity ofdetected memory card insufficientParameter _SigLatched Bit 20
System error detected: Memory cardnot formatted properlyParameter _SigLatched Bit 20
Correctives: Format memory card or copy datafrom drive to memory card.

Description: System error detected: Memory cardis write-protectedParameter _SigLatched Bit 20
Cause: The memory card has been write-protected.
Correctives: Remove memory card or disablewrite protection.

Description: System error detected: Incompatiblememory cardParameter _SigLatched Bit 20
Memory card implicitly written by thedeviceParameter _WarnLatched Bit 20
Cause: The content of the memory card andthe content of the nonvolatilememory are not identical.

Description: System error detected: Nonvolatilememory checksum error (devicename)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 29
System error detected: Nonvolatilememory checksum error (SNMPinformation)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 29
System error detected: Nonvolatilememory checksum errorParameter _SigLatched Bit 29
System error detected: Nonvolatilememory checksum error (LLDP MIBdata)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 29
System error detected: Checksumerror in nonvolatile memory (IM data)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 29
System error detected: Timeoutduring transmission of data
System error detected: Receivedtoggle bit does not match
